ARABIC: يُوسُفُ أَعْرِضْ عَنْ هَٰذَا وَٱسْتَغْفِرِى لِذَنۢبِكِ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلْخَاطِـِٔينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Yusuf, ignore all this, and you, my wife, should ask forgiveness for your evil act. There is no doubt that you are in the wrong.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Joseph, disregard this. And you - woman - ask forgiveness for your sin, for indeed it is you who has been at fault."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Joseph, stay away from such affairs and you, woman, ask forgiveness for your sin; the guilt is yours."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman! Seek forgiveness for your sin; indeed you are of the mistaken.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Yusuf! Turn away from this! (O woman!) Ask forgiveness for your sin, verily, you were of the sinful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Yusuf! turn aside from this; and (O my wife)! ask forgiveness for your fault, surely you are one of the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Joseph, turn away from this; and thou, woman, ask forgiveness of thy crime; surely thou art one of the sinners.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O Joseph! Turn away from this, and thou, (O woman), ask forgiveness for thy sin. Lo! thou art of the faulty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Joseph, overlook this: but you [wife], ask forgiveness for your sin, for you have done wrong."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yusuf! turn away therefrom; and, thou woman! ask forgiveness for thy sin; verily thou hast been of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Joseph, let this matter alone, and you, woman, plead for forgiveness for your sin, for you have indeed been erring.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O Joseph, pass this over! (O wife), ask forgiveness for thy sin, for truly thou hast been at fault!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O Yusuf (Joseph)! Turn away from this! (O woman!) Ask forgiveness for your sin. Verily, you were of the sinful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Joseph, turn away from this. And you, ask forgiveness for your sin. You are indeed one of the sinners'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Joseph, turn away from this. And you, woman, ask forgiveness for your sin; you are indeed in the wrong.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Joseph, ignore this. And, [my wife], ask forgiveness for your sin. Indeed, you were of the sinful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:29] Then he said: O, Joseph, ignore this, matter and do not mention it [to anyone], lest it be broadcast; and you, O Zulaykhā, ask forgiveness for your sin: surely you have been of the erring’, the sinful; but the tale was reported and became public.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Her brother then said to Joseph: (0 Joseph! Turn away from this) and do not inform anyone. And then he turned to the woman and said: (and thou, (0 woman), ask forgiveness for thy sin) seek your husband's forgiveness for your act. (Lo! thou art of the sinful) you cheated your husband.
